dt-page.title: 5. Warning: Unknown paging action
dt-page.summary: This warning will occur if the `dt-api page()` method is called with an action that is not known to DataTables.
dt-page.content:
The built-in `dt-api page()` method has a number of options for changing the page, for example you can pass in the string `dt-string next` to jump to the next page. This error occurs when the option passed in is not known.
## Meaning
Quite simply, the option passed into `dt-api page()` is not a known action. In this case you will receive the warning:
> Unknown paging action: {action}
where `{action}` is replaced with the option given to `dt-api page()` that is doesn't know.
## Diagnosis
The key to resolving this issue to to find we you are calling the `dt-api page()` method and checking what you are passing into the function as an action.
## Resolution
To resolve this issue, please ensure that you are passing in a valid option as described in the `dt-api page()` documentation.
